content: #6683, #6684, and #6702 add@[pp_with_univ] to ULift, PUnit, PEmpty, Cardinal.lift, Ordinal.lift, ToLevel, and toLevel`. This makes it easier to understand the meaning of these types in the infoview without having to click or mouseover.

I've delegated everything but #6684. For that one, I'm just not sure that Mathlib/Tactic/Basic.lean is the best place for attribute [pp_with_univ] ULift PUnit PEmpty at the moment, but I don't have any suggestions.
My thinking was that it was as fundamental a feature as the Type* syntax which is in that file, and so should live there to ensure it's always available
